title: Launcher Update not working
body:
"Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information."
I've tried reinstalling, running the program as an admin, and restarting my PC and router. 
I'm pretty sure it's also not my antivirus blocking the launcher. 
Don't know where to post logs, as its a lot of text. Can paste them in here though.

Thanks

replies.body: I'm having the same problem but your solution didnt fix...
Are you on the legacy client?  This error can happen for a variety of reasons, but we can help pinpoint the issue by what percent it crashed.  At what percent did you receive this error?
I believe it tries to DL a couple of things, then hits 1% and crashes with "0 Files Scanned".

Thanks for the info!  In this case, your game files are trying to scan to prep for your update, but getting blocked.  The steps you've started are good, but there may be more to it.  Make sure to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that league is added as an exception.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Damn, I believe updating Windows solved it. Thanks for your time!
